snippet.title: HATSUNE MIKU: COLORFUL STAGE! Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A new mobile game featuring Hatsune Miku! Tap to the rhythm of popular songs and collect character cards to customize your own band! Play with Hatsune Miku and her Virtual Friends, as well as an original cast of 20 characters overcoming their struggles through the power of music.

Play today!
iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1580044138
Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sega.ColorfulStage.en
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Official SNS Channels:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ColorfulStageEN
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ColorfulStageEN
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/colorful_stage_en/

© SEGA / Colorful Palette Inc. / Crypton Future Media, INC. www.piapro.net

#colorfulstage
